author: Laura Hoy
title: China’s Coronavirus Lies Don’t Excuse Trump’s Egregious Failures
description: Dr. Desai's bold interview blames Donald Trump's inaction, not China, for the coronavirus crisis in the U.S. The post China’s Coronavirus Lies Don’t Excuse Trump’s Egregious Failures appeared first on CCN.com
content:
• Donald Trump and his supporters have been focused on shifting the blame to China for the coronavirus crisis in the U.S.
  • But as Dr. Desai pointed out on Fox News, the U.S. inaction is the real reason testing and treatment are so limited.
